```{r, echo = FALSE, message = FALSE}
library(ggplot2)
library(xkcd)
```

```{r theme_xkcd, cache = TRUE}
p <- ggplot() + geom_point(aes(mpg, wt), data=mtcars) +
     theme_xkcd()
p
```
